# Government Tender Announcement

## Halifax Citadel National Historical Site - Janitorial Services

### Tender Number & Publication Details
* Tender Reference Number: PW-23-01028282
* Solicitation Number: 5P300-22-0214/A
* Publication Date: March 01, 2023
* Closing Date and Time: March 28, 2023, at 13:00

### Description of Requirements
The Parks Canada Agency requires the provision of janitorial services at the Halifax Citadel National Historical Site. The scope of work shall include regular cleaning and on-demand services through Work Authorizations.

### Term of Contract
The contract period is from the date of contract award to March 31, 2024.

### Security Requirement
Bidders must be aware that a security requirement is associated with this bid solicitation. New personnel security clearance requests will require mandatory fingerprints for the criminal record check.

### Site Visit (Optional)
A site visit is recommended for bidders to acquaint themselves with the work site. The visit will be held at the Halifax Citadel on March 09, 2023. Bidders must confirm attendance and provide the names of participants to the Contracting Authority by March 07, 2023.

### Submission Requirements
Bids submitted via fax or email will be accepted as official. Bidders must use the accepted email address, soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca, to submit bids. The contracting authority will not accept bids submitted directly to the email address of the contracting officer or any other email address.

### Additional Requirements
Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their bids are submitted in the correct format and that they meet all the requirements specified in the solicitation documentation.

### Contracting Authority Contact
 Jaime Creaser, Contracting Officer, Parks Canada
 Phone: 902-266-8592
 Email: Jaime.Creaser@pc.gc.ca

### Documents & Attachments
The solicitation documentation, including addenda, can be accessed at [Government Electronic Tendering Service](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Bidders are responsible for ensuring that they have the most up-to-date documentation when submitting their bids.
